name: Across the Rhine
description: Armoured combat from D-day to the end of the war in Europe!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 100% DirectX compatible graphics Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

reviews.review_text: RETRISM look at all the Great reviews,youve hit on it this time,give us some MORE of this please,and Please dont change anything that some might find PC.Great stuff.Now gotta get this manual out...
